text: termination of state of emergency by petition for any of the purposes for which the legislature may pass a resolution in rsa or rsa a petition may be made in a like manner as provided for in rsa except that petition shall be initiated and balloted in either chamber acting separately and be made to the clerk of the chamber or the assistant clerk pursuant to rsa who shall administer the balloting if approved by a majority of the members of the chamber the chamber shall be deemed to have passed a resolution under rsa or rsa
